name: Connector for Microsoft To Do
description: Outbound Connector to manage items in Microsoft To Do

properties.label: Tenant ID
properties.description: Your Microsoft Tenant ID

properties.label: Client ID
properties.description: Your Microsoft Client ID

properties.label: Client Secret
properties.description: Your Microsoft Client Secret

properties.label: To Do Operation
properties.description: Select one of the available Operations for Microsoft To Do

choices.name: Get List of Check List Items

properties.label: User ID
properties.description: The User ID (or Principal Name) of the User whose Task List the operation is run for

properties.label: Task List ID
properties.description: The Task List ID for which this operation is run

properties.label: Task ID
properties.description: The Task ID for which this operation is run

properties.label: Check List Item ID
properties.description: The Check List Item ID for which this operation is run

properties.label: Display Name
properties.description: The Name displayed for the Task List

properties.label: Display Name
properties.description: The Name displayed for the Task List

properties.label: Title
properties.description: The Title of the Task

properties.label: Body
properties.description: The Body of the Task (Plain-Text only)

properties.label: Categories
properties.description: Comma-separated list of Categories

properties.label: Importance
properties.description: Select the importance of the Task

properties.label: Status
properties.description: Select the status of the Task

properties.label: Start Date & Time
properties.description: Date and Time the Task was started

properties.label: Start Date & Time Timezone
properties.description: Timezone for the Date & Time the Task was started

properties.label: Due Date & Time
properties.description: Date and Time the Task is due

properties.label: Due Date & Time Timezone
properties.description: Timezone for the Date & Time the Task is due

properties.label: Completed Date & Time
properties.description: Date and Time the Task was completed

properties.label: Completed Date & Time Timezone
properties.description: Timezone for the Date & Time the Task was completed

properties.label: Reminder Date & Time
properties.description: Date and Time the User will be reminded of their Task

properties.label: Reminder Date & Time Timezone
properties.description: Timezone for the Date & Time the User will be reminded of their Task

properties.label: Is Reminder Active?
properties.description: Check if reminder is active else uncheck

properties.label: Is Reminder Active?
properties.description: Check if reminder is active else uncheck

properties.label: Recurring Task?
properties.description: Check if this is a recurring task

properties.label: Recurrence Pattern Type
properties.description: Select the recurrence pattern type

properties.label: Interval
properties.description: The number of units between occurrences (units are days, weeks, months or years depending on the pattern type)

properties.label: Day of Month
properties.description: The day of the month on which the Task occurs.

pattern.message: Please enter a day between 1 and 31

properties.label: Days of Week
properties.description: A List of the Days of the Week on which the Task occurs.

pattern.message: Please enter a comma-separated list of weekday names (Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday). Each name may appear only once.

properties.label: First Day of Week
properties.description: The first day of the week.

properties.label: Week Index
properties.description: Specifies on which instance of the allowed days specified in Days of Week the task occurs, counted from the first instance of the month.

properties.label: Month
properties.description: The month in which the task occurs.

pattern.message: Please enter a number from 1 to 12

properties.label: Recurrance Range Type
properties.description: Select the recurrence range type

properties.label: Number of Occurrences
properties.description: The number of times to repeat the task

properties.label: Start Date
properties.description: The date to start applying the recurrence pattern.

properties.label: End Date
properties.description: The date to start applying the recurrence pattern.

properties.label: Start & End Date Timezone
properties.description: Timezone for the Start and End Date

properties.label: Display Name
properties.description: The displayed name of the Check List Item

properties.label: Checked
properties.description: Is the item currently checked or not?

properties.label: Display Name
properties.description: The displayed name of the Check List Item

properties.label: Checked
properties.description: Is the item currently checked or not?

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
